profileText: a Representative from Rhode Island; born in Bristol, Bristol County, R.I., July 22, 1983; graduated from Milton Academy, Milton, Mass., 2002; B.A., Brown University, Providence, R.I., 2006; M.B.A., Yale University, New Haven, Conn., 2010; teacher; investment professional; general treasurer, state of Rhode Island, 2015-2023; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
